## ðŸ“¥ Submit Your CKAN Site

Help grow the CKAN ecosystem! Submit your CKAN site to be featured in the catalog.

**Required fields are marked with `*`.**

---

### * Email Address
> Used only to contact you if we have questions about your submission.

---

### Your Name (Optional)

---

### * Site Name
> The name of your CKAN site or portal.

---

### * Site URL
> The public URL of your CKAN instance.

---

### * Description
> Briefly describe your CKAN site, including:
> - Types of data published  
> - Target audience  
> - Key features or customizations  

---

### * Organization
> The organization or entity operating this CKAN site  
> *(e.g., City Government, Ministry of Health, Research Institute)*

---

### * Site Type
_Select one_

- [ ] Government (National)
- [ ] Government (Regional/State)
- [ ] Government (Local/City)
- [ ] Research / Academic
- [ ] Non-Profit / NGO
- [ ] Private Sector
- [ ] International Organization
- [ ] Community / Open Data
- [ ] Other:

---

### Country / Region (Optional)
> Where this CKAN site is based.

---

### Data Categories / Domains (Optional)
> Comma-separated values  
> *(e.g., Health, Transportation, Environment, Finance, Education)*

---

### Primary Language(s) (Optional)
> Languages the site is available in  
> *(e.g., English, Spanish, French)*

---

### CKAN Version (Optional)
_Select one_

- [ ] CKAN 2.9
- [ ] CKAN 2.10
- [ ] CKAN 2.11
- [ ] CKAN 3.0
- [ ] Custom / Modified
- [ ] Not sure

---

### API Access (Optional)
